actions.recommendation: Ultrasound to investigate dysmenorrhea and insulin resistance
An annual mammogram is recommended from age 40 and pap smear within 3 years of becoming sexually active.

Increased abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, it's linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene, and try to manage your stress

Reports painful periods- Investigate the possible causes, such as hormone imbalance, high stress, nutrient deficiency or even lack of sleep. Try a combination of a calcium supplement plus vitamin D, together with cognitive behavioral therapy techniques
